mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_ID , PRODUCT_ID , TITLE , MEM_ID , ( SELECT MEM_ID FROM CHATROOM WHERE ROOM_ID = s.ROOM_ID AND MEM_ID != #{sender_id} ) AS receiver_id , GRADE FROM CHATROOM AS s WHERE MEM_ID = #{sender_id} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT TYPE , MESSAGE , ROOM_ID , SEND_TIME FROM CHATTING WHERE ROOM_ID = #{room_id} ORDER BY SEND_TIME DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT c1.ROOM_ID , c1.PRODUCT_ID , c1.TITLE , c1.MEM_ID , c1.STATUS FROM CHATROOM c1 JOIN CHATROOM c2 ON c1.ROOM_ID = c2.ROOM_ID WHERE c1.MEM_ID = #{sender_id} AND c2.MEM_ID = #{receiver_id} AND c2.PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
